001package imagingbook.common.threshold;
002
003import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
004import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
005
006public abstract class Utils {
007
008        // compute the sum of a histogram array
009        public static int sum(int[] h) {
010                int cnt = 0;
011                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
012                        cnt += h[i];
013                }
014                return cnt;
015        }
016
017        public static int count(int[] h) {
018                return count(h, 0, h.length - 1);
019        }
020
021        // compute the population of a histogram from index lo...hi
022        public static int count(int[] h, int lo, int hi) {
023                if (lo < 0) lo = 0;
024                if (hi >= h.length) hi = h.length-1;
025                int cnt = 0;
026                for (int i = lo; i <= hi; i++) {
027                        cnt += h[i];
028                }
029                return cnt;
030        }
031
032        public static double mean(int[] h) {
033                return mean(h,0,h.length-1);
034        }
035
036        public static double mean(int[] h, int lo, int hi) {
037                if (lo < 0)
038                        lo = 0;
039                if (hi >= h.length)
040                        hi = h.length - 1;
041                long cnt = 0;
042                long sum = 0;
043                for (int i = lo; i <= hi; i++) {
044                        cnt = cnt + h[i];
045                        sum = sum + i * h[i];
046                }
047                if (cnt > 0)
048                        return ((double) sum) / cnt;
049                else
050                        return 0;
051        }
052
053        public static double sigma2(int[] h) {
054                return sigma2(h, 0, h.length-1);
055        }
056
057        // fast version
058        public static double sigma2(int[] h, int lo, int hi) {
059                if (lo < 0)
060                        lo = 0;
061                if (hi >= h.length)
062                        hi = h.length - 1;
063                long A = 0;
064                long B = 0;
065                long N = 0;
066                for (int i = lo; i <= hi; i++) {
067                        int ni = h[i];
068                        A = A + i * ni;
069                        B = B + i * i * ni;
070                        N = N + ni;
071                }
072                if (N > 0)
073                        return ((double) B - (double) A * A / N) / N;
074                else
075                        return 0;
076        }
077        
078        // this is a slow version, only for testing:
079//      protected double sigma2(int[] h, int lo, int hi) {
080//              if (lo < 0) lo = 0;
081//              if (hi >= h.length) hi = h.length-1;
082//              double mu = mean(h,lo,hi);
083//              long cnt = 0;
084//              double sum = 0;
085//              for (int i=lo; i<=hi; i++) {
086//                      cnt = cnt + h[i];
087//                      sum = sum + (i - mu) * (i - mu) * h[i];
088//              }
089//              if (cnt > 0)
090//                      return ((double)sum) / cnt;
091//              else 
092//                      return 0;
093//      }
094
095        // compute the median of a histogram 
096        public static int median(int[] h) {
097                int K = h.length;
098                int N = sum(h);
099                int m = N / 2;
100                int i = 0;
101                int sum = h[0];
102                while (sum <= m && i < K) {
103                        i++;
104                        sum += h[i];
105                }
106                return i;
107        }
108
109        public static double[] normalize(int[] h) {
110                int K = h.length;
111                int N = count(h);
112                double[] nh = new double[K];
113                for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
114                        nh[i] = ((double) h[i]) / N;
115                }
116                return nh;
117        }
118
119        public static double[] normalize(double[] h) {
120                double[] nh = new double[h.length];
121                double hmax = max(h);
122                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
123                        nh[i] = (double) h[i] / hmax;
124                }
125                return nh;
126        }
127
128        public static double max(double[] h) {
129                double hmax = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
130                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
131                        double n = h[i];
132                        if (n > hmax)
133                                hmax = n;
134                }
135                return hmax;
136        }
137
138        // TODO: change to use an ImageAccessor!
139        public static int getPaddedPixel(ByteProcessor bp, int u, int v) {
140                final int w = bp.getWidth();
141                final int h = bp.getHeight();
142                if (u < 0)
143                        u = 0;
144                else if (u >= w)
145                        u = w - 1;
146                if (v < 0)
147                        v = 0;
148                else if (v >= h)
149                        v = h - 1;
150                return bp.get(u, v);
151        }
152
153        // used for logging/testing only
154        public static double[] getLine(ByteProcessor bp, int v) {
155                double[] line = new double[bp.getWidth()];
156                for (int u = 0; u < line.length; u++) {
157                        line[u] = bp.get(u, v);
158                }
159                return line;
160        }
161
162        // used for logging/testing only
163        public static double[] getLine(FloatProcessor fp, int v) {
164                double[] line = new double[fp.getWidth()];
165                for (int u = 0; u < line.length; u++) {
166                        line[u] = fp.getf(u, v);
167                }
168                return line;
169        }
170
171}
